summary: Run these script when all else fails. Is a bug crazed follow attacking you?
descriptionHtml:
[size=24pt][color=green]Follower Attack Fix[/color][/size]

Throw these file in your "Data" Folder in your Skyrim Dictionary.

Is a bug crazed follower attacking you?

[color="#078C38"]H[/color][color="#0D9633"]o[/color][color="#14A02F"]w[/color] [color="#22B526"]T[/color][color="#29C022"]o[/color] [color="#36D519"]U[/color][color="#3DDF15"]s[/color][color="#44EA10"]e[/color][color="#4BF40C"]:[/color]

Hit the command key and click the problem npc and type "bat ffix".
author: IZakaIDzeroNo
